channel.title: administrivia on The Odd Bit
channel.description: Recent content in administrivia on The Odd Bit

item.title: New static site generator
item.description: I’ve switched my static site generator from Pelican to Hugo. I’ve tried to ensure that all the old links continue to work correctly, but if you notice anything missing or otherwise not working as intended, please let me know by opening an issue. Thanks!

item.title: Administrivia: Pelican and theme update
item.description: I’ve just refreshed the version of Pelican used to generate this blog, along with the associated themes and plugins. It all seems to be working, but if you spot a problem feel free to drop me a line.
